channel.title: Can someone help me make a member system?
channel.description: ok, well, I made a member system for people i want members. However, i made a member island and people started to get custom items and I don't know how. Can someone help me maybe make it so you need to be a member to wield the item?

item.title: Can someone help me make a member system?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

nah, i don’t. LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me make a member system?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:3, topic:267486”]if(!isMember)
sM(“Thanks for the donation”);

} else {

if(!isntMember)
     sM("You can't wear this fagget")[/quote]

I take it you don’t understand the ! operator.

Read full topic
